participant_1.background:
I have my family members in my heart, even if I've never met them.
my inspiration is clasical music.
i do not talk a lot.
I look dapper while walking my clients' dogs.
I sometimes eat too much sugar, which can cause my blood sugar levels to spike.

participant_2.background:
I have three very close roommates, but I don't see my family often.
I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest.
I am not close with my family, but I love my dog Bob.
I'm always up for going to a movie with my new love.
I prefer not to have pets since my home is my sanctuary and I need it to be a quiet place.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! Just got back from a walk with my clients' dogs.
That sounds fun! I'm not much of a dog person myself, but I do like cats.
I'm not really a cat person, but I like them more than I used to.
I'm glad we can agree on something! What do you do for a living?
I'm a dog walker, and I also do some part-time work as a pet sitter.
That sounds like a fun job! I'm a juggler for a living, and I come from a small town in the Midwest.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to juggle.
It's not as hard as it looks! I started when I was a kid.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I like to listen to classical music, and I also like to read.
I love classical music too! What are some of your favorite pieces?
I love Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata, and I also love Tchaikovsky's Nutcracker Suite.
Those are both great pieces! I'm more of a Mozart fan myself, but I love all of those composers.
I can definitely appreciate Mozart. He's a genius.
